phrases.text: Mấy lời mẹ dặn con thơ
phrases.english: A few words mother tells her young child

culturalContext.description: Mother's advice to her child before a journey - classic Vietnamese maternal love theme
facts: Maternal guidance central to Vietnamese culture
Children leaving home was momentous

phrases.text: Chữ tình chữ nghĩa con lo cho tròn
phrases.english: Love and duty, child, worry to fulfill completely

culturalContext.description: Mother advises on tình (affection) and nghĩa (duty) - core Confucian values
facts: Tình-nghĩa fundamental to Vietnamese ethics
Balance of emotion and obligation

phrases.text: Mẹ già cầu chúc cho con
phrases.english: Old mother prays and blesses for her child

culturalContext.description: Elderly mother's prayers for traveling child - maternal devotion
facts: Prayer was common for travelers
Elderly status emphasizes mother's age and concern

phrases.text: Khoa trường đắc cử thành công con về
phrases.english: Pass the exams, succeed, and return home, child

culturalContext.description: Mother's hope for child's success in imperial examinations and safe return
facts: Mandarin examinations were path to honor and prosperity
Success brought glory to family

phrases.text: Con đi cách trở sơn khê ơ con đi cách trở sơn khê
phrases.english: Child goes far across mountains and streams, oh child goes far across mountains and streams

culturalContext.description: Description of the difficult journey through mountains and streams - repeated for emotional emphasis
facts: Travel was arduous in feudal Vietnam
Mountains and streams represented real obstacles

phrases.text: Áo nâu con giữ tình quê cho mặn nồng
phrases.english: Brown tunic, child, keep the homeland feeling rich and deep

culturalContext.description: Brown tunic represents peasant/homeland identity - mother advises to keep roots
facts: Brown was color of common people
Maintaining homeland connection while away was important

phrases.text: Có điều chi con gửi tin hồng
phrases.english: If there's anything, child, send a pink letter

culturalContext.description: Request for communication - 'tin hồng' (pink letter) means good news
facts: Letters were precious in feudal times
Pink/red associated with joy and good fortune

phrases.text: Kẻo mẹ già tựa cửa ngồi trông võ vàng
phrases.english: Lest old mother lean at door sitting watching in vain

culturalContext.description: Powerful image of elderly mother waiting at door - classic Vietnamese maternal longing
facts: Mother at door is iconic Vietnamese image
Waiting in vain was common fear

phrases.text: Gạo đây mang lấy mà ăn
phrases.english: Rice here, take it to eat

culturalContext.description: Mother gives rice for journey - rice symbolizes maternal care and sustenance
facts: Rice was most precious provision
Giving rice showed deep maternal love

phrases.text: Tiền đây mang lấy ít quan con tiêu đường
phrases.english: Money here, take a little, child, to spend on the road

culturalContext.description: Mother gives money for travel - even 'a little' was sacrifice for poor families
facts: Money was scarce in feudal Vietnam
Mother's sacrifice for child's journey

phrases.text: Con đừng bận bịu vấn vương
phrases.english: Child, don't be burdened and entangled

culturalContext.description: Mother advises child not to worry too much about home - focus on goals
facts: Balance between filial duty and personal success
Mother releases child from worry

phrases.text: Bước đi còn lắm dặm là trường dặm còn xa
phrases.english: Steps to go still many miles, long miles still far

culturalContext.description: Final reminder of the long journey ahead - both literal and metaphorical
facts: Long journey was reality of travel
Also metaphor for life's journey
